languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс переводит дыхание.{/n} "Пока действует приказ Лорд-инквизитора, я нахожусь подле тебя. Как только Святая Инквизиция примет другое решение..." {n}Он делает неопределенный жест рукой.{/n} "Такова природа моего долга. Мои желания в этом вопросе ничтожны".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс переводит дыхание, его голос чуть срывается.{/n} "Пока действует приказ Лорд-Инквизитора, я нахожусь подле тебя. Как только Святая Инквизиция сочтет, что мое присутствие в твоей свите больше не является необходимостью..." {n}Он делает неопределенный жест рукой.{/n} "Такова природа моего долга. я связан долгом. И не принадлежу себе. Мои желания ничтожны".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс переводит дыхание.{/n} "Пока действует приказ Лорд-инквизитора, я нахожусь подле тебя. Как только Святая Инквизиция примет другое решение..." {n}Он делает неопределенный жест рукой.{/n} "Такова природа моего долга. Мои желания в этом вопросе ничтожны".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."

{n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."

{n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."

{n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."

languages.text: {n}海因里希呼了口气。{/n}“只要大审判官的命令依然有效，我就会留在你的身边。可如果审判庭做出了其他决定……”{n}他做了个模棱两可的手势。{/n}“这就是我的职责所在。至于我想要什么，那并不重要。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希呼了口气。{/n}“只要审判长的命令依然有效，我就会留在你的身边。可如果审判庭做出了其他决定……”{n}他做了个模棱两可的手势。{/n}“这就是我的职责所在。至于我想要什么，那并不重要。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix suelta aire.{/n} «Mientras las órdenes del Lord Inquisidor sigan en vigor, estaré a su lado. Pero en cuanto la santa Inquisición cambie de parecer...». {n}Gesticula vagamente.{/n} «Es la naturaleza de mi cometido. Lo que quiera o deje de querer es irrelevante».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix suelta aire.{/n} «Mientras las órdenes del Lord Inquisidor sigan en vigor, estaré a su lado. Pero en cuanto la santa Inquisición cambie de parecer...». {n}Gesticula vagamente.{/n} «Es la naturaleza de mi cometido. Lo que quiera o deje de querer es irrelevante».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは息を吐く。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターの命令が有効な限り、俺はあなたの側にいる。しかし、聖なる異端審問庁が別の決定を下し次第…」{n}彼は曖昧な身振りをする。{/n}「それが俺の責務の本質だ。俺の望みは関係ない」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは息を吐く。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターの命令が有効な限り、俺はあなたの側にいる。しかし、聖なる異端審問庁が別の決定を下し次第…」{n}彼は曖昧な身振りをする。{/n}「それが俺の責務の本質だ。俺の望みは関係ない」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix laisse échapper un soupir.{/n} « Tant que le seigneur inquisiteur n'en décidera pas autrement, je resterai à vos côtés, mais dès que je recevrai de nouveaux ordres... {n}dit-il en faisant un geste vague.{/n} Telle est la nature de mon service, que cela me plaise ou non. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laisse échapper un soupir.{/n} « Tant que le seigneur inquisiteur n'en décidera pas autrement, je resterai à vos côtés, mais dès que je recevrai de nouveaux ordres... {n}dit-il en faisant un geste vague.{/n} Telle est la nature de mon service, que cela me plaise ou non. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix atmet aus.{/n} "Solange der Befehl des Großinquisitors gilt, werde ich an Eurer Seite sein. Aber sobald die Heilige Inquisition eine andere Entscheidung trifft ..." {n}Er gestikuliert vage.{/n} "Das liegt in der Natur meines Diensts. Was ich will, spielt keine Rolle."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix atmet aus.{/n} "Solange der Befehl des Großinquisitors gilt, werde ich an Eurer Seite sein. Aber sobald die Heilige Inquisition eine andere Entscheidung trifft ..." {n}Er gestikuliert vage.{/n} "Das liegt in der Natur meines Diensts. Was ich will, spielt keine Rolle."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun emirleri yürürlükte olduğu sürece yanında olacağım. Ancak Kutsal Engizisyon, farklı bir karar verdiği an..." {n}Belli belirsiz bir el işareti yapıyor.{/n} "Hizmetimin tabiatı bu. Ne istediğim, bunun bir parçası değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix releases a breath.{/n} "While the Lord Inquisitor's order remains in effect, I will be at your side. But as soon as the Holy Inquisition makes a different decision..." {n}He gestures vaguely.{/n} "That is the nature of my service. What I want doesn't come into it."
